reviews.review_text: We love that place! The authentic know how of noodles making is great to observe and it tastes so good in the plate! Vegetables, soups, noodles with lamb or chicken, and even fried rice are so tasty. The broth is both light and full of flavors. The music isn t too loud and the people are very nice. We feel very welcome. In summary, we warmly recommend that restaurant.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much  We are looking forward to see you again!

reviews.review_text: Excellent Chinese noodle restaurant with handmade noodles, lots of Vegan options, veggie dishes, pleasant atmosphere, great service, a must go place for any Vegans in Vancouver. Dishes are very tasty

The food here is absolutely delicious, we come back over and over and everytime it is so tasty. The owners shared with us that the recipe for the Lanzhou Beef noodle soup is over 100 years old and has been passed down through their family. It is my favorite soup, very light but such depth of flavour. You can even watch the chef hand pull the delicious noodles. A must visit if you are a foodie!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your wonderful review! Were thrilled to hear that you love our food and keep coming back for more. Our family takes great pride in our over 100-year-old recipe for Lanzhou Beef noodle soup, and were delighted to hear that its your favorite. We believe in using only the freshest ingredients to create a soup that is both light and bursting with flavor. Were glad you had the opportunity to watch our skilled chef hand pull the noodles. Its a technique that has been passed down through generations of our family, and were proud to keep this tradition alive. As a restaurant that values our culture and heritage, were always delighted to share our love for Chinese cuisine with foodies like you. We look forward to welcoming you back to Noodle Arts soon for another delicious meal!

reviews.review_text: They make an amazing vegan Dan Dan noodles that I think about night and day. Ask for added tofu (yes, you will get the vegan tax- they remove the meat and charge an additional $3 for tofu) but it s worth it. Also, it s a lot of tofu so if you go with a vegan friend split the added tofu.

The most perfect bowl of noodle soup. Ordered the Lanzhou Beef Noodle soup and it was amazing. Brought a lot of nostalgia to the ones I had back in China. The star of the show was 100% the noodles, hand pulled noodles are super unique in texture and these certainly delivered. The soup were really nice and light, accompanied by good amount of green onions and cilantro. Would strongly recommend the spicy option as it as another level of depth to the soup.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Appreciate your review massage! It s our pleasure to having you in our restaurant!

reviews.review_text: Very tasty Lanzhou pulled noodle! Good soup and nice noodle texture. Service was great and very fast during lunch. Will come back again
Ill admit looks a bit odd from the outside but the food and service are great authentic Chinese / Sichuan cuisine. The music was a bit too much radio pop for my liking

5 stars for this little noodle shop,  HAND made noodles ! You can watch the guy in the back make them. Broth was delicious, service was fast and friendly. This place was made famous on the morning show on CTV.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot! Try some new dish next time. We have lots of delicious food.

reviews.review_text: From the moment we walked into the restaurant we received the best service! The owner offered us tea and even dedicated some minutes to chat with us. She was very friendly and it was very insightful to learn a bit about the background of the restaurant, including part of her personal journey and the history behind the food we were being served. When ordering, you get to choose the thickness and style the hand-made noodles you ll be eating! And you can also see how they are done through the open window of the kitchen. Our food was served soon after we ordered, with a beautiful presentation that was just a glimpse of how good it was going to taste. My Dan Dan noodles were delicious! Creamy and with just the right balance of spiciness! This place is HIGHLY RECOMMENDED and MUST if you are in the neighborhood!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much. Hope to seeing you soon.

reviews.review_text: We love the noodle soup. The scallion pancake beef rolls are to die for. Great food and great service. Kid-friendliness: There were thick plastic plates provided for young kids. Plastic cups with lids for their drinks, too. Even a pair of scissors for parents to cut the noodle if needed.

Simple yet beautiful small restaurant. The food is good quality. The teapot and dinnerware arent like the cheap quality you see in most restaurants. I notice small details like that. The food was simple and tasty and I didnt leave super thirsty(aka MSG filled places). Attentive staff and family passed down recipes. Will come again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your reviews. we hope to see you soon

reviews.review_text: Absolutely delicious! I came by for a quick eat and Im happy I did. The server was so friendly and pointed out all of the options that could be made vegan (aside from the stuff already clearly labelled). We got the chili noodles, spring rolls and salted tofu. I will definitely be coming back :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words. We hope to see you soon

reviews.review_text: You must try this restaurant  Hand pulled noodle so fresh and texture so good. No MSG added  Best noodle in town. Vegetarian options: lots of option for vegetarian/Vegan
Hands down the best Chinese food Ive ever had. The hand pulled noodles in the Den den were amazing! Im from Colorado and will be coming back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your reviews. Hope to see you next time when you travel in Vancouver.

reviews.review_text: Amazing beef noodle soup. The chef making your noodle in front of you is cool to see.

I got the traditional Lanzhou beef noodles (A1), and it was delicious. The broth was very clear and light. You can customize the noodles width and broth spiciness level. I liked that it also came with small side dishes. Overall, I would highly recommend giving this place a try, especially their noodles which are all hand pulled in front of you in their open kitchen.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot

reviews.review_text: These hand-pulled noodles are the best of the best. Getting to see the chefs in action, then eating your noodles seconds later, just can t be beat. Delicious, clean flavours are met with friendly, fast service. I know I ll be back again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much! See you next time

reviews.review_text: The food is really delicious. Traditional Lanzhou beef noodles is the best hand pulled noodles I have ever eaten in Vancouver. Cold noodles tastes very refreshing and suitable for summer. I will come back next time.

I recently visited Noodle Arts restaurant and was blown away by their authentic Lanzhou noodles! The handpulled noodles were absolutely delicious and perfectly cooked. I also tried their fried rice and soup which were both flavorful and satisfying. The side dishes were also delectable and complemented the main course perfectly. The service was fantastic, the staff were very friendly and accommodating, making our dining experience even more enjoyable. Overall, I highly recommend Noodle Arts restaurant for anyone looking for authentic Lanzhou noodles and delicious Chinese food!

Food was delicious and the service was amazing. Staff was friendly and it was nice to see into the kitchen where you can see the chef making the noodles. I would definitely recommend this place and would visit again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot for your comments.

reviews.review_text: Theyre all about the noodles here and it really shows! The menu was a bit confusing. The first few noodle dishes are combos and come with cold dishes which are posted in the back. In addition the first column are all soup dishes and the second dry noodle dishes. It would be helpful to deliniate all of these choices with different headers. The food itself was awesome and so good! There are a ton of choices for their hand pulled noodles. You can get them extra thon, thin, normal, wide, or extra wide and you can watch them hand pull the noodles thanks to a large mirror into the kitchen. A lot of my family got their traditional beef noodle soup which was pretty good. I got their dry noodles with lamb and knife cut noodles which are super thick and chewy (which I loved). The dish itself was a bit salty though. Of note, the spice that goes into the noodle soups has peanuts which was good to know since my brothers have peanut allergies ): The other picture is a piece of beef roll (they come cut into four pieces). Also delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your comments. we hope to seeing you soon .

reviews.review_text: The lanzhou beef noodle soup was delicious.  Nice portion of hand pulled noodles.  The broth and beef slices were delicious and satisfying.  The server was friendly and attentively refilled our tea.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for the review message! Looking forward to see you again!

reviews.review_text: We tried Lanzhou hand pulled beef noodle , Beijing noodle and pancake beef roll. Also tried Niang Pi & sweet oatmeal yeast. Everything is delicious, service is good too.

What a delicious experience! The owner greeted us so kindly and suggested amazing dishes. The Beef scallion roll was incredibly good. I also love to see an owner who is so hands on and hardworking. It definitely reflects in the quality of food! Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you my dear customer  I am really happy for you enjoy the meal with us. Many thanks for your kindly words. we will try our best  to seve everyone who support us  All the best

reviews.review_text: We enjoyed the harmony of broth, Chilli sauce,  hand-pulled chewy noodles every day during our stay in Vancouver. Its genuinely traditional and irreplicatible. Dont miss it if you happen to pass by and quality matters to you.
High quality food, relatively quick service, and a nice atmosphere. You can even watch them pulling dough into noodles. Also has a fish tank. Their traditional noodle soup: Food

We had a really good experience with the owner of the restaurant, who helped us choose some delicious meals. The noodles and the broth are handmade and really tasty. The Dan-Dan noodles are my personal recommandation, so good. The Lan Zhou are also really good, and come with some nice extra for the price if you choose the combo A.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for visiting my restaurant I hope you and your family enjoy the meal and I am looking forward to seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: This is a very cozy and authentic Northern Chinese noodle restaurant. We ordered number 3 (traditional LanZhou Noodle soup) and number 11 (Lamb stir fried noodles). The best combo of noodle type and it s dishes is that for the soup, ask for thin noodles (not extra thin); and for the lamb dish ask for the Dao Xiao Mian type (the noodle master uses his  flying sword  to cut the noodles). #3 dish is the most authentic one I have found in the downtown neighborhood. It has a tiny taste of numb spice. #11 uses cumin to cook the lamb and noodles. Their noodle master is on the same level as Ding Tai Feng. Their decoration wall uses the Paitings from Dun Huang MoGao Craves, first caves were dug out in AD 366 as places of Buddhist meditation and worship.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you I am looking forward to seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: If you are very hungry, be careful to get close to their door because the WONDERFUL smells of their food will make your stomach suffered! I ordered a Chilli Oil Noodles; such a big portion that I couldn t finish it. They packed them up for me to bring home, and I was tempted to eat them up upon I got home. My son had a traditional beef noodles, with extra thin noodles; you can t believe they were hand-pulled, as thin as your hair. Beautiful taste, freshly made-on-spot noodles, friendly service; highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much

reviews.review_text: Really great vegetarian noodles. The host was very kind and accommodating. Definitely trust her recommendation. Vegetarian options: Plenty good vegetarian options available here
We really enjoyed the Lanzhou classic noodles here! Its one of the best noodles place. Their noodle soup is very delicious.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot for your reviews. I looking forward to seeing you next time.

reviews.review_text: Very nice newly opened Chinese tradictional noodle place. The soup is super delicious. The noodle is made after the order in an open kitchen in a really arty way called La Mian(streching the dough many times), the word Ramen really means.
Ordered the wonton soup when I was sick and it was THE cure. Super fresh, can tell they dont use msg. Went back to try other noodles dishes and did not disappoint!
Amazing food and the whole staff there! Great work!!

Wow!!! This was is fantastic, and reminds me of eating the in noodle shops of Beijing.  All noodles are hand pulled to order with great service and reasonable prices.  The food was so good, we ordered more to go for leftovers after our dine-in meal!  Highly recommended! Kid-friendliness: We took our 3 daughters (10, 13 & 14) and they LOVED it!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much! Hope to see you next time.

reviews.review_text: Original beef noodle from Lanzhou, along with many other choices of side dish. The soup is very hearty and not too salty. Try the pepper source they have in house!

The food is just amazing! Great dishes, handmade noodles, a lot of flavors, it reminds me Beijing, the owner is very nice and always gives good advice when you dont know what to choose. The dandan mian are a great discovery! Thank you!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks

reviews.review_text: Great service! Loved the food. Big portions were appreciated!
Great food (with vegan options). Attentive service. Lovely people.

Amazing food, everything was delicious. We got the dan dan noodles with peanut sauce, beef noodle soup, and beef/lamb dumplings. Everything was 10/10. And the service was great and the restaurant owner was so nice. Would recommend to anyone looking for a fantastic, authentic Chinese meal in Vancouver.
Best Lanzhou noodle in town. Good price as well.
The beef roll is delicious. The way it was cooked was perfect.
Simple dishes. Done right. Very rare find. Noodles are hand made/ thrown fresh. A big factor to already great flavors. Highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear customer,thank you so much for your comments. I am so glad you like our food and share your experience on google. We are looking forward to seeing you soon! Happy thanksgiving to you!

reviews.review_text: Exactly the authentic Chinese food we hoped to find in Vancouver. Every dish was absolutely fantastic.

This place is a hidden gem; the staff was so friendly and attentive and the food was delicious! I was impress my 6 year old almost finish a whole plate by him self, definitely a must try if you like fresh noodles!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you! So glad your child finished so much!

reviews.review_text: Very good Chinese food in the heart of downtown. Tasty and good portions. Sour spicy fish was a must order. Overall good experience!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much

reviews.review_text: Such a great little gem near English Bay! Must try their noodles

Delicious! The best noodle soup Ive ever had! All the ingredients were fresh and full of flavor! The owner and chefs were very friendly! The owner told us about her hometown where the food is from. The chefs saw us struggling to cut our noodles and came out of the kitchen to give us scissors! Ive never been treated so well at a restaurant before. I had a wonderful experience and would recommend it to everyone without any hesitation.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Ian

reviews.review_text: We are never disappointed here. The server is so nice and friendly. The food is delicious and the portions are good too! I saw a lot of reviews complaining about the portions but honestly we always have to take home some leftovers :) It s definitely our favourite restaurant with my boyfriend. So lucky to live around the area! I don t know the name of the server but she has gave us some suggestions on the food and I must say, she is always right! Hahhaha

Tried a few different dishes here and they were all AMAZING. The ingredients were fresh, and the flavour was delicious. You can see the chefs pulling and preparing the noodles by hand through a window, it s so cool! This just became one of my favourite places to get Chinese food in Vancouver! Whether you re a tourist or a local, you have to try this place!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot.

reviews.review_text: Very impressed! I had the Combo A Lanzhou noodles and everything was perfection. Best Lanzhou noodles that I ve tried in Vancouver. The noodles are hand pulled and the flavour of the broth and beef were wonderful. We also had the pork dumplings and was also impressed with their flavour. Service was excellent and super attentive. She made a point to help us order and make recommendations and my tea cup was never left empty. Can t wait to come back to try the other dishes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your reviews. We are looking forward to seeing you again

reviews.review_text: This place is incredible, the staff is friendly, the noodles are unbelievable. The best wide noodles Ive ever had, hands down. The tea was also excellent.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot for your comments. I look forward to seeing you next time.

reviews.review_text: The lady who served us was very nice - and the food was great. I would recommend to anyone for nice hand made noodles.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your support

reviews.review_text: Weve been here a couple of times and always left satisfied.  The food is prepared fresh and you can even see the noodles being prepared in the glass enclosed kitchen. The food is not overly salty or overspiced and has a delicate and complext flavour profile.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you

reviews.review_text: Fresh made noodle sure taste good, broth was so good, worth the trip
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you

reviews.review_text: This is a must visit when you are in this area. The owner is super friendly and cooks one of the best noodle in the city. Check out their Lanzhou Niu Rou Mian (beef noodle soup), better than any Ramen or Pho in the area. The broth is so refreshing without lacking any flavors and the hand made noodles are smooth and easy to digest. Add on some pork dumplings and beef onion pancakes then you have a beautiful meal for 3. Dont miss out!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the kind words. we are looking forward seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: The beef noodle soup is absolutely amazing, clean, light, fragrant, hand pulled noodles texture is soft and smooth but the beef roll. OMG its unreal, slightly sweet, slightly salty, flaky and one of the best things I ever have eaten.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your reviews.We are looking forward to seeing you again

reviews.review_text: Their beef noodles are really tasty and anthentic. Noodles are properly done. You can choose different thickness of the noodles. The broth is yummy, and their chili oil on top of the soup is the best. Their owner is very friendly. Definitely would go back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your comments

reviews.review_text: I ordered combo B - Lan Zhou beef noodle, I was amazed by its flavor.  Being a North western Chinese, I was touched by its authenticity because I dont see many good Chinese restaurants in downtown. Then I ordered beef wrap and lamb carrot dumpling. To be honest I always find the dumplings in Vancouver to be somewhat not delicious so I didnt have that much expectation for it, but this one is really good, its tasty and comfy food. I also like the apricot sweet desert - it has a piece of apricot and Chinese hawberry, again, I really like it.  The side dishes are simple but flavory.  The tea is special, the flavor is light but pleasant. I feel like they dont just run it as a business, they care about the food they deliever. In addition, the environment is clean and the owner is very friendly. During the whole time of dining, i kept saying so good or the service is good to my friend. I mean, everyone has their preference about food but for me, for what I ordered, i was impressed and definitely will go again! Good experience :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear customer thank you so much for visiting us and such a beautiful reviews. Our goal is delivery the delicious  high quality food and best service for every customer. I also want to spray our histroy and culture for the local people. I am so happy about my customers love our food. Thanks a lot and hope to seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: I usually dont have Chinese food but my visit here was really good. Shop was empty due to corvid and so service was very fast. The noodles I choose were the beef noodles with the lowest spice level but it was still pretty spicy so it makes me wonder what the highest level will be like. You can also ask for their homemade chili sauce to dip your meats into. Had a really good meal here and might visit again
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot  Hope to seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: The food is extremely flavourful! I was a bit nervous to try it out because the restaurant never looked busy, but we gave it a chance....very happy we did. We got the traditional beef pulled noodles and it was so flavourful and fresh. I will absolutely be coming back for more.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank you for this comment,it made our day to hear that our food is meeting the requirements of customers taste buds.  We look forward to seeing you again.

reviews.review_text: Dan Dan noodles with spicy peanut sauce is all I have to say. Yum yum

Best Lanzhou noodle in town! The owner is super friendly and attentive, I also like the decor and the cleanliness of the restaurant, plus you can see the kitchen where the chef makes the noodles. Definitely recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

reviews.review_text: Very authentic Chinese hand made noodles, better than the ramen. Got the traditional beef noodle with the wide flat noodles, boys love   them, they both said would pick this over ramen for sure.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks! So happy to see thei boys  smile faces

reviews.review_text: Tried the cumin noodles with beef and shredded noodles with vegetables.  The cumin noodles were some of the tastiest noodles I have ever tried.  The texture of the shredded noodles was thick and chewy, just the way we like them.  Small, cozy establishment and friendly service.  Lots of vegetarian options as well.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much this comment was passed down to the kitchen staff and it made our day.   Hope to see you guys again!

reviews.review_text: Visited this evening with my sister and was struck by the kind, attentive and genuine service from a lady who I think may have been the owner. From the minute we sat down she was friendly but not overbearing or upselling. We accidentally received a meat version of a dish we wanted to be vegan (forgot to specify) and she gave us a discount while being super apologetic. Really appreciated that and will definitely come back to try more, because on top of everything, the food was excellent - especially the blade cut dan dan noodles! Love local small businesses like this.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your reviews. I am looking forward to seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: My favorite beef rolls in the West End (ish area)! Also tried the beef noodle soup theyre famous for, chili wontons and smashed cucumber. Loved everything and excited to try more of their menu soon. The staff clearly take pride in their work and sharing their culture. Wonderful experience!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot. Hope to see you soon.

reviews.review_text: We decided to walk down Robson and pick a restaurant we havent tried before. We had two dishes, the wide noodle with beef in broth, and the stir fried cumin lamb with blade cut noodles. Fast and attentive service and food was very tasty.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you We hope to see you again.

reviews.review_text: Incredible, being able to now eat authentic, northern-west, hand-pulled noodles in Vancouver.  Theyre made live for you in the kitchen, which is completely visible to patrons. For years, Ive been to various Japanese noodle houses.  Noodle Arts is providing quality noodles which completely exceeded my expectations. For us, on the second time we went, we were coincidentally greeted by the owner.  Much appreciate the clean premesis and service! We have already brought friends and family, and of course, will return. Thank You for bringing this culture to Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Dear customer thank you for your comment! we are happy to know you like our food,hope to see you again.

reviews.review_text: Had their traditional Lanzhou beef noodles. The broth was incredibly aromatic, noodles perfectly al dente, and the aromatics just add to the food, never upstaging what was in the bowl. Great service, happy to have found this little gem. Will 10/5 come back here for more!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot welcome  to try other dishes next time. You will love it

reviews.review_text: Hands down one of the best Asian restaurant in the West end. The food is always cooked to perfection and there pan fried pork buns are to die for! The service is in point and I cant stress enough about the owner, an absolute sweet heart. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone and I usually do find myself here every week
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much  I am so glad you love our food. I am looking forward to seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: Such a Great Homemade Noodle place! Tucked away, but very flavorful dishes. The Owner is so sweet, She always makes sure we have everything we need and Suggests other dishes to try!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your reviews we are looking forward to seeing you soon.

reviews.review_text: The staff are very friendly! I love that you can see when they cook things for you. The food is absolutely amazing. I come here every week. Specifically recommend Mushu Pork with blade cut noodles. Definitely a must visit Chinese restaurant in West End!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your comments.  We will try our best to made delicious food for all my customers

reviews.review_text: Fabulous, hand pulled noodles. Welcoming staff, they answered our questions and refilled the tea often. The Dan Dan noodles are amazing! Highly recommend.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much!

reviews.review_text: OK.... so where to start.   First thing is, I almost missed this place because of 3 fake reviews, and one unfair on their opening day. This place is amazing.  Authentic Lanzhou noodles.   100%Legit.  The wife says they are better than she had there.   After our meal we talked with the owner and she told us that her family has over 60  restaurants across generations in Lanzhou.  She brought their expertise and flavor here. She is extremely friendly, and has pored her heart and soul into this place. We were actually lucky to get in here.  We were 3 minutes late for the place down the street, which shall remain nameless, and Im actually glad we got turned away. I didnt realize that Noodle Arts closes for the sane interval as Density down the street (name changed to protect the sheeple xiao long bao place).  Not only did the owner and others take our order, they stayed almost an hour past their closing time, and never even said a word.   The other place would have attacked us with pitchforks, cleavers, broken bottles and chopsticks to get us to leave by 3:01.   OK, maybe I exaggerate..... they wouldnt use chopsticks. Go figure, but Noodle Arts has amazing noodles, and everything is first rate (top ingredients). Anything with flour is hand pulled.  Thin to thick, flat or shaved.... its all great. The pan-fried dumplings were loaded with meat/filling and possibly the best Ive had.  We went back to the sheeple place after I posted this review, and their pan-fried soup dumplings, the rolled fried dumplings, and the regular fried dumplimgs were all extremely inferior to Noodle Arts. And at the other place, we were in our seat at least 45 minutes before their siesta, and they rushed to get us to put in our complete order.  We asked that they give us the dessert (chocolate & yummy) dumplings last...... and they said of coirse..no problem.   Guess what came out first?  No problem was out the window, and we were stuck with dessert dumplings waiting for us..... almost as inpatiently as the workers. If you are in Vancouver and looking for Chinese, dont miss this place.  Skip the line down the street, and come here.  You can order chocolate dumplings later. Also, Nikka, who apparently has been with them since the beginning, is a great server.  Very attentive and a pleasure to deal with.  Young, but an extremely intense listener, and observer.  Not Chinese, but she is definitely one of the most customer oriented servers I met while in  Canada. To the Yelp moderators.....  get rid of the fake reviews.  I would tell Yelp, but they dont seem to care when Trolls attack restaurants... BOO
reviews.response_from_owner_text: thank you very much we finished reading your comment to our staff in the main hall and kitchen and your review made our day!

reviews.review_text: The noodles here are the perfect texture. We had takeout because of covid restrictions but the food turned out really good even though we weren t able to have it fresh in the restaurant. The service at the restaurant was friendly and the prices were very reasonable. We look forward to eating here again once the restaurant opens with covid restrictions loosening
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your support I am looking forward to seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: This is the best Chinese restaurant in Vancouver. The western Chinese food is top tier, and the authentic food brings me back to my time in China.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you my dear customer. Hope to see you next time.

reviews.review_text: Extremely clean and follows covid protocols. Owner was very welcoming and made great recommendations. Cumin lamb fried Lai men and spicy beef lan Zhou noodle soup combo b were delicious. Fast service and owner refilled tea several times without being prompted.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your reviews Hope to see you soon

reviews.review_text: The art of great food is to make the difficult simple while maintaining the highest standards. I hope many will visit and enjoy authentic Lanzhou noodles and other fine authentic dishes offered. This is a gem in Vancouver!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot

reviews.review_text: the cumin beef noodle was INCREDIBLE, and the spicy ginger beef was delicious. love the tea and the dishes they used to serve with too. 5/5!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for your comment. we are looking forward to seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: We dine in as family and loved fried noodles. The texture was very good. Server was very kind and helpful. It is nice that you can choose the thickness of the noodle.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you We are looking forward to seeing you soon! Thank you for your support!

reviews.review_text: I lived in China for a couple of years and I can say, without a doubt, that this is the best noodle restaurant house in Vancouver. The service is awesome and the restaurant is clean and inviting. I would recommend this to anyone and will be going often!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Warmest thanks and hope to see you soon

reviews.review_text: The Lanzhou soup just hit the spot on a cold winter day.  The broth was superb!!! Very attentive service. Vegetarian options: Carrot,bok choy,broccoli, cabbage
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much my dear customer. we look forward to seeing you next time

reviews.review_text: Outstanding hand pulled noodles. The owners were amazing and we got to try their specialty. A must for Vancouver!

This little family owned gem tucked away in the west end is a must! The authentic lanzhou noodles were great, the service was amazing and the owner was very warm, welcoming and friendly! Really recommend this place
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for your kind words! Hope to see you soon

reviews.review_text: Its sad that the street appeal for this place isnt great, because its totally worth a stop. Noodles were perfect, and everything was delicious! Would come again.
Friendly people, quality meat, excellent noodles, and beautiful interior design. A must go for sure
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a kind review! Were so happy to hear that you enjoyed not only our food, but also our friendly staff and beautiful interior design. We believe in using only the highest quality meat and ingredients to create our delicious dishes, and were thrilled to hear that you appreciated the care we put into every aspect of our restaurant. We hope to see you again soon at Noodle Arts for more excellent noodles and a warm welcome from our team!

reviews.review_text: Great food! Fantastic place!
Very very good food. The food lives up to the hype. I would recommend the dandan noodles.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your reviews.Hope to see you soon

reviews.review_text: Happened to come across this place while walking down Robson. THE BEST FOOD IVE EVER HAD. Absolutely delicious!!!! It s a must try for sure. A3 and F8 soooo good
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much  we are looking forward seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: Delicious food and very good service.
Delicious food! Huge menu with lots of vegan/vegetarian options as well. Im not a huge fan of noodles in general but this place was so good that I will come back.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot  welcome to try the other food on our menu

reviews.review_text: Great noodles and delicious meals all the time. The service is friendly and prompt. We love the food and come here when we are in Vancouver
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot .

reviews.review_text: Food was delicious, the menu is a good size and has lots of options. We were given some recommendations that did not disappoint and recieved very friendly attentive service. We will be back for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot!

reviews.review_text: Had a craving for pork buns so I ordered some for takeout, they were delicious and I saw they snuck an extra one in! Will definitely be back to try more of their menu.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks a lot for the reviews! Welcome to try other food,you will love them too! All the Best!

reviews.review_text: Ate here  today,for the first time, on the recommendation of my nephew who lived in China for several years. Absolutely delicious! I will definitely be back!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you very much for your comments  we are looking forward to seeing you soon

reviews.review_text: Best wonton soup of my life. Fresh wontons with no MSG. At a good price. My favorite place in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks

reviews.review_text: Tasty noodles with great service.   My favourite are the wide noodles but they all have a great flavour and texture.
